rules.natural: If the factory produces the drug, then the drug requires approval.
Either the factory produces the drug or the plant operates normally.
Whenever an issue is reported to the supervisor, the incident is investigated by the team.
In case the batch is contaminated with the substance, it is shipped to customers.
Either the batch is contaminated with the substance or, if the plant is not operating normally, then the material is stored properly.
Should the batch be quarantined at the facility, then it is not shipped to customers.
The batch is quarantined at the facility or it is tested thoroughly.
Assuming the batch is tested thoroughly, it is destroyed safely.
Provided that the drug requires approval, it is not approved by the agency.
In case the batch is destroyed safely, then it is not shipped to customers.
If the company is profitable in the quarter, then it is expanding its operations.
Should the company be profitable in the quarter, then it is not expanding its operations.
Assuming the facility is compliant with regulations, the company is not fined by the regulator.
Provided that the facility is audited annually, it is compliant with regulations.
Either the facility is audited annually or it is inspected regularly.
If the facility is inspected regularly, then it is certified to the standard.
In case the facility is certified to the standard, it is compliant with regulations.
Provided that the compound is stable in the formulation, the ingredient is pure in quality.
Assuming the ingredient is pure in quality, the drug is safe for patients.
